Description: A string of 18 small, short cylindrical beads: made from green glazed steatite. Some are worn.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: British School of Archaeology, Egypt
Curator's comments: Bibliography: G. Brunton & G. Caton-Thompson, ‘The Badarian Civilization’ (London, 1928), Grave register, pl. V; Bead corpus, pl. XLIX, 75B15, C3; pl. L, 86P16.
Bibliographic references: Andrews 1981 / Catalogue of Egyptian Antiquities. Jewellery I (25)
